snippet: Mr. Napier was a character actor who portrayed ruffians, military officers and other strong men in films like the second Rambo movie, but played against type as a judge in “Philadelphia.”
lead_paragraph: Mr. Napier was a character actor who portrayed ruffians, military officers and other strong men in films like the second Rambo movie, but played against type as a judge in “Philadelphia.”

headline.main: Charles Napier, Actor Who Played Tough Guys, Dies at 75
headline.print_headline: Charles Napier, 75, Actor Who Played Tough Guys
headline.seo: Charles Napier, Actor Who Played Strong Men, Dies at 75
